Recommendations:

- Show long-term commercial viability and scalability to indicate sustainable growth potential.

- Provide a realistic and well detaild resource and cost requirements for business operations.
- Clearly explain the revenue model to show how the business will generate income.
- Provide realistic projections that align with outlined revenue targets.

- Establish a clear governance or advisory board to strengthen business structure.
- Show evidence of the entrepreneur's commitment, such as personal investment or business development efforts.
- Outline the environmental or sustainability efforts that your team has made to showcase that you implement responsible practices in business.
- Strengthen the market analysis with solid and factual data to support the business plan. Also, include the sources of the information presented.
- Provide a more robust analysis of the competition in the industry to demonstrate good industry understanding.
- Show realistic demand estimates with supporting data to validate market need.
- Clearly outline and describe the business' target customer(s) to demonstrate a strong understanding of the customer base and their needs.
- Carry out a thorough regulatory environment analysis and outline how the business plans to meet the regulatory requirements and address compliance .
- Provide a realistic and well detaild resource and cost requirements for business operations.
- Detail any prior funding efforts to demonstrate investor interest or capital-raising capability.

- Highlight any unique skills or expertise that the team members possess, as well as any competitive advantages that set your business apart from others in the market
- Establish a clear governance or advisory board to strengthen business structure.
- Clearly establish what diffrentiates the business from competition by emphasizing innovative components and/or processes that distinguish the business.
- Outline the environmental or sustainability efforts that your team has made to showcase that you implement responsible practices in business.
- Show realistic demand estimates with supporting data to validate market need.
- Carry out a thorough regulatory environment analysis and outline how the business plans to meet the regulatory requirements and address compliance .
- Provide evidence showing that the business will be money genrating and the strategies for attracting investors
- Detail any prior funding efforts to demonstrate investor interest or capital-raising capability.
- Demonstrate how the product addresses significant societal or environmental challenges.
- Explain how the business can have a broad, positive environmental impact.

- Clearly establish what diffrentiates the business from competition by emphasizing innovative components and/or processes that distinguish the business.
- Strengthen the market analysis with solid and factual data to support the business plan. Also, include the sources of the information presented.
- Show realistic demand estimates with supporting data to validate market need.
- Clearly outline and describe the business' target customer(s) to demonstrate a strong understanding of the customer base and their needs.
- Provide evidence of market growth potential. This shows the long-term business viability.
- Carry out a thorough regulatory environment analysis and outline how the business plans to meet the regulatory requirements and address compliance .
- Provide a realistic and well detaild resource and cost requirements for business operations.
- Clearly explain the revenue model to show how the business will generate income.
- Provide evidence showing that the business will be money genrating and the strategies for attracting investors
- Detail any prior funding efforts to demonstrate investor interest or capital-raising capability.
- Provide realistic projections that align with outlined revenue targets.
- Demonstrate how the product addresses significant societal or environmental challenges.
- Explain how the business can have a broad, positive environmental impact.
- Show long-term commercial viability and scalability to indicate sustainable growth potential.

- Entrepreneurial commitment to business
- Product innovation & differentiation
- Market analysis
- Detailed competitive landscape
- Customer demand estimation
- Customer understanding
- Market growth potential
- Regulatory environment
- Resourcing requirements
- Financial statements assumptions
- Bankability
- Previous grants and funding
- Revenue target feasibility
- Job creation potential of the business
- Environmental impact
- Scalability & viability
Recommendations:
Highlight any unique skills or expertise that the team members possess, as well as any competitive advantages that set your business apart from others in the market
- Establish a clear governance or advisory board to strengthen business structure.
- Show evidence of the entrepreneur's commitment, such as personal investment or business development efforts.
- Clearly establish what diffrentiates the business from competition by emphasizing innovative components and/or processes that distinguish the business.
- Strengthen the market analysis with solid and factual data to support the business plan. Also, include the sources of the information presented.
- Provide a more robust analysis of the competition in the industry to demonstrate good industry understanding.
- Show realistic demand estimates with supporting data to validate market need.
- Clearly outline and describe the business' target customer(s) to demonstrate a strong understanding of the customer base and their needs.
- Provide evidence of market growth potential. This shows the long-term business viability.
- Carry out a thorough regulatory environment analysis and outline how the business plans to meet the regulatory requirements and address compliance .
- Provide a realistic and well detaild resource and cost requirements for business operations.
- Complete all three financial statements for a clear picture of financial health.
- Provide evidence showing that the business will be money genrating and the strategies for attracting investors
- Detail any prior funding efforts to demonstrate investor interest or capital-raising capability.
- Provide realistic projections that align with outlined revenue targets.
- Clearly demonstrate the job creation potential of the business by outlining the number of jobs it can create per period. 
- Explain how the business can have a broad, positive environmental impact.
- Show long-term commercial viability and scalability to indicate sustainable growth potential.
